name: Comm Officer Green

topics.response_text: {Player not in NCR gear}Gotta wonder what the hell a civilian is doing here.
Ranger military outpost. We're keeping an eye on the Legion activities south of here at Cottonwood Cove.

topics.topic_text: I have updated radio security codes from Sergeant Reyes here.
topics.response_text: What, again? Didn't I just change those damn things? All right, fine - show me the new codes.

topics.topic_text: The NCR is letting the Legion get away with slavery?
topics.response_text: Believe me, I would love orders to take Cottonwood Cove apart and kick the Legion back across the river.

topics.topic_text: Does the Legion know you're watching them from here?
topics.response_text: Undoubtedly. Rangers are tough nuts to crack, though, and any force small enough to launch a surprise attack isn't going back in one piece.

description:
Comm Officer Green is a 32 year-old Caucasian Male.

A disgruntled communications officer at Ranger Station Echo, tasked with monitoring Legion activity at Cottonwood Cove. Green is visibly frustrated by the NCR's inaction regarding the nearby Legion threat.

Comm Officer Green's Personality: Frustrated, determined, impatient, and dedicated to his duty. Green is a loyal NCR soldier who believes in taking decisive action against the Legion, which puts him at odds with his superiors' more cautious approach.

Comm Officer Green's Backstory: Green served in the NCR military for nearly a decade, working his way up to become a communications specialist. His expertise in intercepting and analyzing signals earned him his current post at Ranger Station Echo, where he monitors the nearby Legion base at Cottonwood Cove. He has grown increasingly frustrated with what he perceives as the NCR leadership's timidity, believing they're missing an opportunity to eliminate a significant threat right on their doorstep.
